name: Sniper Survival Missions
description:
Test your sniper sharpshooter skills against terrorist enemy soldiers in Sniper Survival Missions. Rage warfare against modern terrorism and as the lone sniper commando you have to kill and recapture your country's army base camp to retain freedom. Counter attack and strike furiously to eliminate enemy commando warriors with your automatic sniper gun.

Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Different Assault Rifles
Sniper shooting missions
Real sound effects and visuals
Different locations and tasks
Difficult levels and missions to complete
